trans-unit.source: The dataset is an extended version of the Movie Tweetings dataset.
trans-unit.target: The dataset is an extended version of the Movie Tweetings dataset.

trans-unit.source: The dataset has 170K ratings for movies, extracted from well-structured tweets on Twitter.
trans-unit.target: The dataset has 170K ratings for movies, extracted from well-structured tweets on Twitter.

trans-unit.source: Each instance represents a tweet and is a tuple: user ID, IMDB movie ID, rating, timestamp, numer of favorites for this tweet, and number of retweets of this tweet.
trans-unit.target: Each instance represents a tweet and is a tuple: user ID, IMDB movie ID, rating, timestamp, numer of favorites for this tweet, and number of retweets of this tweet.

trans-unit.source: The dataset was made available by A. Said, S. Dooms, B. Loni and D. Tikk for Recommender Systems Challenge 2014.
trans-unit.target: The dataset was made available by A. Said, S. Dooms, B. Loni and D. Tikk for Recommender Systems Challenge 2014.
